title: HOST - The Insane Horror Movie Filmed Entirely During Quarantine!
author: Think Story
comment: This is so impressive. Getting the actors involved in doing their own mini sets and stunts is so cool.
If one of my friends pranked me like that, I would break quarantine just to whoop their ass.

The demon isn't suspending a mask in midair, the computer can see what we can't and is applying one of Emma's filters on the face of the demon. It's invisible man style stuff. that's why his footprints can be seen in the flower and the blanket (thrown over him) shows his shape.
Damnnn! Props to them for coming up with a movie like this.
If they keep these movies going as long as this pandemic is gonna last we'll have a 5 or 6 parts lol.
description:
In this video we take a look at Shudder's latest horror film HOST and explain  how it was filmed entirely during quarantine and lockdown. How was it made? Who is the demon? Zoom horror movie?
